definition: to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: A scientist said they were probably picked up by a waterspout or mini-tornado out at sea.
sentences.chinese: 科學家說它們很可能是被龍捲風從海上捲來的。

sentences.english: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.chinese: 龍捲風使整個沿海的廣播都中斷了。

sentences.english: Much of Greensburg, Kansas has been leveled by a tornado.
sentences.chinese: 差不多整個堪薩斯州的格林斯堡都被龍捲風推平了。

sentences.english: In some areas, red earth produces dramatic scarlet-hued tornadoes.
sentences.chinese: 在有一些地方，紅色的地球製造猩紅色的龍捲風。

sentences.english: In fact, 70 percent of tornado warnings are false alarms.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，70%的龍捲風警報都是誤報。

sentences.english: 1884 - First known photograph of a tornado is made.
sentences.chinese: 1884年的今天，首張已知的龍捲風照片被拍攝。

sentences.english: Tornadoes have a strong instability in the cumulonimbus of.
sentences.chinese: 龍捲風產生於強烈不穩定的積雨雲中。

sentences.english: Further south in Washington County, Alabama, a large tornado was reported on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 報道說，華盛頓市偏南的地區，還有一股大的龍捲風。

sentences.english: It's one of many tornados that are destroying our city.
sentences.chinese: 這是那些毀滅我們城市的龍捲風之一。

sentences.english: And rebuilding after the floods and tornadoes may deliver a fillip in the second half of the year.
sentences.chinese: 而且洪水以及龍捲風後重建也可以刺激下半年的經濟。

sentences.english: US deadliest tornado kills 122 people in Missouri.
sentences.chinese: 美國密蘇蘇裏州遭致命龍捲風襲擊，122人死亡。

sentences.english: The funnel crowd dropped right there at the laundromat.
sentences.chinese: 龍捲風正好到達自助洗衣店。

sentences.english: Phil told me there was a new tornado in our area.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾告訴我新一輪龍捲風襲擊我們的教區。

sentences.english: Twisters are born in thunderstorms and are often accompanied by hail.
sentences.chinese: 龍捲風在雷雨中誕生，並常伴有冰雹。

sentences.english: Briarwood third-grade student Caden talked about what he experienced as the tornado passed.
sentences.chinese: 布埃爾伍德三年級學生卡登談論他所經歷的龍捲風。

sentences.english: There have been over 450 tornado-related deaths this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年已經有超過450人因龍捲風死亡。

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
to undergo change in weather/restoration of reactionary rule or the previous regime
